attributes.action: stop forcing lupus sufferers losing disability and being forced into working
attributes.additional_details:
i have been recently diagnosed with LUPUS SLE. lupus is a crippling dieses that results in the auto immune system to break down and attacks the enternal and external organs such as heart,  liver. lungs. spleen  resulting organ transplants having to be done to save the lifes of the sufferer.

many have suffered with this disability for a number of years and lost a range of there cognitive skill such as hearing, eye sight use of hands and legs and some suffer from crippling pains yet the goverment is still trying to force these people to work and sending them to interviews at the D.H.S one of the things that brings on a flare upo the lupus is stress and worry  we feel lupus is and can be a life threatening issue
